summary: This is an email chain from December 2008 discussing an upcoming article about Jeffrey Epstein's work release program in a Palm Beach newspaper. The emails show awareness and concern about the article's publication, with references to individuals being quoted.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the upcoming article about his work release program.

persons.name: Herman
persons.context: Mentioned as being quoted in the upcoming article about Epstein's work release.

persons.name: Goldberger
persons.context: Mentioned as being quoted in the upcoming article about Epstein's work release.

events.title: Article Publication on Epstein's Work Release
events.description: An article about Jeffrey Epstein's work release program was scheduled to be published in a small Palm Beach newspaper.

keyFacts: An article about Jeffrey Epstein's work release program was set to be published in a Palm Beach newspaper in December 2008.
Individuals named Herman and Goldberger were quoted in the upcoming article.
The email chain shows internal communication attempting to preempt or manage the news about Epstein's work release.
